Translations.Text: DEUS SIC toughens those believe humiliates disbelievers
Vos expect iniit Paradise DEUS distinguishing those among vos qui strive sine distinguishing those est steadfast
Vos used long decessus vos face it Statim vos faced it rectus tuus eyes
Muhammad est non multus than messenger messengers eum. he abiit Should get killed vos turn tuus heels Anyone turns his heels non hurt DEUS in the parvus DEUS rewards those est appreciative

Non 1 abiit deus sinister apud predetermined temporis Whoever seeks vanities hoc saeculum nos dedit eum therefrom whoever seeks rewards Hereafter nos beatus eum therein! Nos reward those est appreciative
Multus prophet habet godly people fight eum sine ever wavering pressure causa de DEUS nor perfecit they hesitate become discouraged DEUS loves the steadfast
Their unus utterance est Noster Dominus forgive nos noster sins noster transgressions strengthen noster foothold grant nos victory disbelievers
Consequently DEUS granted them rewards hoc saeculum bonus rewards de Hereafter DEUS loves BONUS doers
